titleStmt.title: The sacrifice of a contrite heart in teares, meditations, and prayers. Penned by Iohn Euans minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Evans, John, minister of Gods word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. M[athewes] for Richard Hamond, and are to be sold at his shop of the vpper end of Fleete lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
